text: Can you share what api call that you are using?

FYI the objects API got an update to the error messages! Look for "Enriched Error Messages in Public CRM Object APIs" inside your product updates!

Hello, does anyone know if an API exist to deal with the avatar of a user ? We didn't find anything in the documentation unfortunatly neither un the user properties in the standard API.
If you're looking to do this programmatically, would using Gravatar and its API make sense?

Hey all, how can I find a list of all the default property names of objects in their JSON formatting? I see the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/properties/HubSpots-default-deal-properties|default deal properties page> , but it only gives a handful of property names in the example code. I can see properties on that page like "Amount" which translates to "amount" in the JSON object, but if I want to get the "Deal Owner" property, what JSON key name do I use? It clearly isn't "owner" based on my query results from an API call. Can anyone help me out with this?
